comments:
F1 on XP
Connect to download.eclipse.org/updates
Expand 200205211339
Click on Show Matching Features
Select Platform [QNX Photon], install in platform:/base
Eclipse doesn't restart, no log

C:\Eclipse F1\eclipse>java -cp startup.jar org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main -data
C:\Install
java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no swt-pi-gtk-2040 in java.library.path

Well, I would not expect to be able to execute the QNX code on XP, so the 
inability to restart is obvious.

However, this points out a more serious problem .... we actually allowed the 
install to proceed. We should not. We are not just downloading .zips to some 
download folder ... we are actually applying the changes to the running 
configuration, so we should not allow a feature that does not match the 
environment to be installed.
The checking should be done in [Install] enabling, as well as delta processing
*** Bug 17124 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Will handle this as part of the ActivityConstraints work for bug 18656
